CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 21, 1955, pg. 11 reads: "Recitalists - Marie Carter Hayes, director of the Hayes School of Music, 6490 Frankstown Avenue (second floor) is presenting her second annual Spring Recital, featuring Menona Roberts, at the piano, and Beverly Foreman, right, vocalist, Sunday, May 22 at 5 p.m. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Menona Roberts at piano, and vocalist Beverly Foreman posed in Hayes School of Music with portraits and landscape painting on wall and ornate clock on mantle, another version
